question: The advantage of skewing in induction motor is/are

answers.a: Motor runs smoothly as the magnetic hum is reduced
answers.b: The tendency of the rotor teeth to remain under the stator teeth due to direct magnetic attraction is reduced
answers.c: More uniform torque is obtained while running
